properties.title: Cabane du Mont Fort CAS
properties.description: Formerly it was an alpine cabin in the Mont Fort and Rosablanche area, today it is a mountain guest house and a rustic restaurant for skiers in winter. The view of Montblanc as well as the traditional atmosphere in and around the house remain. Mountain bikers love the area for its various transport facilities while mountain hikers choose GÃ¤mspfad (Sentier des Chamois) to Lac de Louvie and on to Fionnay or traverse to Dixence reservoir.
